cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with the problem of distributed source simulation, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The problem involves generating sequences with a joint distribution that is close to a given joint distribution, which is a common problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and signal processing (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the case where the sources are binary, which is a common topic in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper provides a single-letter condition for successful simulation, which involves analyzing the asymptotic behavior of the system, a topic in mathematical modeling (cs.MM).
